question_en: Which sentence is correct in the simple present tense for third person singular?
question_zh: 以下哪句是第三人稱單數的簡單現在式正確句子？
options: He go to school every day.
He goes to school every day.
He going to school every day.
He gone to school every day.
answer: He goes to school every day.
answer_en: He goes to school every day.
answer_zh: He goes to school every day.
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數動詞通常要加 -s 或 -es，因此正確句子是 He goes to school every day。

question_en: She _____ (like) to read books in her free time.
question_zh: 她在空閒時間_____（喜歡）看書。
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數動詞要加 -s，所以 like 變成 likes。

question_en: Choose the correct verb form: "My father _____ (work) in a bank."
question_zh: 選出正確動詞形式："我爸爸_____（工作）在銀行。"
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數現在式動詞要加 -s，因此 work 變成 works。

question_zh: 哪一句句子是不正確的？
options: He go to the gym on Mondays.
It rains a lot in spring.
answer: He go to the gym on Mondays.
answer_en: He go to the gym on Mondays.
answer_zh: He go to the gym on Mondays.
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數動詞要加 -s，應該是 He goes to the gym on Mondays。
動詞 watch 結尾是 ch，第三人稱單數要加 -es，變成 watches。
否定句中助動詞 does not (doesn't) 後面動詞用原形，所以是 doesn't like。

question_en: My cat _____ (sleep) on the sofa every day.
question_zh: 我的貓每天_____（睡）在沙發上。
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數動詞要加 -s，sleep 變成 sleeps。

question_en: Which verb form is correct for third person singular?
question_zh: 以下哪個動詞形式是第三人稱單數正確的？
explanation_zh: 第三人稱單數動詞通常加 -s 或 -es，go 變成 goes。
動詞 do 在第三人稱單數時變成 does。
第三人稱單數動詞要加 -s，play 變成 plays。
